<h3 id="X22712">X(22712) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: MCCAY TO 1st BROCARD-REFLECTED</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*(b^2+c^2)*a^6-(2*b^4+b^2*c^2+2*c^4)*a^4-4*(b^2+c^2)*b^2*c^2*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*b^2*c^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22712) = 2*X(3)+X(76) = 4*X(3)-X(11257) = 5*X(3)+X(13108) = X(4)-4*X(3934) = X(4)+2*X(5188) = 2*X(5)+X(9821) = X(20)+2*X(6248) = 2*X(76)+X(11257) = 5*X(76)-2*X(13108) = X(98)+2*X(5976) = X(262)+2*X(6194) = X(262)-4*X(15819) = 2*X(3934)+X(5188) = X(6194)+2*X(15819) = 5*X(11257)+4*X(13108)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(99).</p>
<p>X(22712) lies on these lines:
{2,51}, {3,76}, {4,3934}, {5,3096}, {20,6248}, {30,7697}, {35,10079}, {36,10063}, {39,631}, {40,12263}, {69,9744}, {114,3314}, {140,3095}, {141,1513}, {182,385}, {194,3523}, {230,3094}, {264,22062}, {371,19089}, {372,19090}, {376,9466}, {383,3642}, {384,5171}, {519,22697}, {538,3524}, {542,8592}, {543,11167}, {549,7757}, {575,7766}, {576,3329}, {599,6054}, {698,13468}, {726,10164}, {732,5085}, {736,21445}, {842,9832}, {1080,3643}, {1350,13860}, {1351,11174}, {1352,16990}, {1385,7976}, {1587,8992}, {1588,13983}, {1656,7944}, {1799,3425}, {1916,6036}, {2021,21843}, {2080,3972}, {2709,5108}, {2794,7810}, {3058,22706}, {3098,5999}, {3102,5420}, {3103,5418}, {3104,22692}, {3105,22691}, {3106,16242}, {3107,16241}, {3398,6179}, {3399,6680}, {3406,8150}, {3515,12143}, {3525,6683}, {3526,11272}, {3545,22682}, {3582,22730}, {3584,22729}, {3734,8722}, {3815,13330}, {3830,22681}, {4108,8704}, {5007,10359}, {5050,14614}, {5052,7736}, {5055,22728}, {5064,22480}, {5092,8350}, {5204,18982}, {5217,13077}, {5306,13331}, {5432,12837}, {5433,12836}, {5434,22705}, {5657,14839}, {5969,7610}, {5987,12584}, {6309,7751}, {6684,12782}, {6776,14994}, {7422,18304}, {7616,8782}, {7746,10357}, {7770,12110}, {7780,8149}, {7793,13335}, {7804,10788}, {7815,18806}, {7824,9737}, {7841,14639}, {7846,20576}, {7865,22678}, {7870,15561}, {7898,13449}, {7987,9902}, {8556,9756}, {9301,10347}, {9769,15035}, {10267,13110}, {10269,13109}, {11055,15693}, {11151,11152}, {11237,18971}, {11238,22711}, {11672,14252}, {12007,15480}, {13083,21156}, {13084,21157}, {13086,14651}, {13862,16986}, {14711,15698}, {15717,20081}, {19875,22650}</p>
<p>
X(22712) = midpoint of X(2) and X(6194)<br>
X(22712) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (2, 15819), (3830, 22681)<br>
X(22712) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 76, 11257), (3, 183, 98), (140, 3095, 7786), (183, 5976, 76), (194, 3523, 13334), (631, 12251, 39), (1350, 15271, 13860), (3524, 7709, 21163), (3734, 8722, 11676), (3934, 5188, 4), (5085, 8667, 9755), (5980, 5981, 7771), (6194, 15819, 262), (22714, 22715, 22677)<br>
</p>
